duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve coding quality alerts/edits and address customer’s quality concerns.
Verify accuracy of assigned PCS codes, review charge and procedure code mismatches, validate discharge dispositions.
Review codes with revenue integrity for NCD/LCD coverage, review encounters for full complete, accurate and consistent coding.
Determine coding accuracy based on a customer’s specific complaint.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or GED equivalent required, Undergraduate (Associate's or Bachelor's) degree in HIM/HIT preferred, RHIA, RHIT, or CCS preferred
